overview:
Yacine Benzine was born in Algeria, and is also a French citizen; he lived in Ethiopia before finally settling in NYC at the well-traveled age of 11. Currently he focuses on the business, marketing and finance side of MyBloop, although he sometimes also participates in development. He decided to join the team because “I’ve heard many good ideas over the years (I’ve come up with many myself that never came to fruition) but this is the first time that I sincerely believe the project I’m involved with will be seen all the way through.”

Source: MyBloop.com
